Ability - Insight #14

People can feel a isolated

We believe...

Some risk colleagues can feel a isolated because they don’t have access to peers who also work in risk. Providing this would give them an informal support network, either for advice or more pastoral support.

Because we've seen and heard...

The survey results

People expressing frustration at ploughing a lone furrow in teams that don’t get it.
